summary: I OWN A 1999 DAEWOO NUBIRA.  FOR THE LAST YEAR OR SO IT DOES WHAT THE TOYOTAS ARE DOING.  MORE SO IN THE SUMMER MONTHS.  THIS PAST SATURDAY WHEN I WAS STOPPED IT STARTED REVVING IN DRIVE, I PUT IT IN NEUTRAL, IT REVVED HIGHER, I PUT IT IN PARK AND IT SETTLED DOWN.  THIS MORNING AT 2 AM. IN COOL WEATHER, IT EVEN WAS REVVING IN PARK, I HAD TO TURN IT OFF.  WHAT SHOULD I DO. HAVE YOU HAD OTHER COMPLAINTS?  THANK YOU *TR

DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED THAT PRIOR TO RECEIVING A RECALL LETTER PERTAINING TO THE ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING: CAMSHAFT CENSOR - CAMPAIGN ID # 04V357000,  THE CONTACT HAD THE TIMING BELT REPAIRED ON TWO OCCASIONS AS WELL AS THE ENGINE INSTALLED BY AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC.  THE CONTACT ASKED THE MECHANIC IF THE TIMING BELT AND ENGINE MALFUNCTION COULD HAVE BEEN CAUSED BY A DEFECT.  THE MECHANIC DENIED THAT IT COULD HAVE BEEN THE CASE. WHEN THE DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND ASKED THE SAME QUESTION THE DEALER DETERMINED THE CAMSHAFT CENSOR COULD ABSOLUTELY CAUSE THE TIMING BELT TO FREEZE UP AND AFFECT THE ENGINE AS WELL.  THE DEALER CONFIRMED THAT VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL RECOMMENDED THE VEHICLE TO BE TOWED TO THE DEALER FOR THE RECALL WORK.  THE MODEL WAS A NUBIRA.*AK
1999 DAEWOO NUBIRA WILL NOT START. CONSUMER WOULD LIKE MANUFACTURER TO PAY FOR RECALL REPAIRS AND BAD PARTS. *KB  *JB

DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH ON NORMAL ROAD CONDITIONS, THE ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALERSHIP WHO DETERMINED THE CRANKSHAFT POSITION CENTER ACTIVATED THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT.  A RECALL LETTER WAS RECEIVED HOWEVER THE DEALER DID NOT PERFORM THE RECALL REMEDY. ALTHOUGH THE VEHICLE'S VIN WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL THE CAMSHAFT LOT RANGE WAS OUT OF SCOPE.*AK

DT*: THE CONTACT STATED UPON RECEIVING A RECALL LETTER PERTAINING TO THE CAMSHAFT MODULE VALVE THE MANUFACTURER WAS CALLED. THE MANUFACTURER SENT A FOLLOW UP LETTER STATING THAT REIMBURSEMENT WOULD BE MADE FOR ANY PARTS AND LABOR PERFORMED FOR THE RECALL ON THE VEHICLE.  THE CONTACT EXPRESS DISTRUST THAT DAEWOO, WHO FILED FOR BANKRUPTCY, WOULD HOLD TRUE TO THIS AGREEMENT.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN SERVICED.  UPDATED 8/14/2006 - *NM

CONSUMER COMPLAINT CONCERNING THE 1999 NUBIRA CAMSHAFT SENSOR RECALL.  *TS  THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER AND THE CAMSHAFT SENSOR WAS REPLACED.  THE CONSUMER WAS CHARGED FOR THE REPAIR AND REQUEST REIMBURSEMENT.  *NM

DT*: THE CONTACT STATED A RECALL LETTER WAS RECEIVED IN MAY 2006 REGARDING NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID # 04V357000; ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING. THE CONTACT LOCATED A DEALERSHIP HOWEVER, THE DEALER REFUSED TO PERFORM THE RECALL BECAUSE THE CONTACT DID NOT PURCHASE THE VEHICLE THERE.   THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT IS ILLUMINATED IN THE VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE IS A 1999 NUBIRA  DAEWOO.  UPDATED 7/7/2006 - *NM

ENGINE WARNING SIGN SOMETIMES KEPT COMING AND GOING OR BLINKING. WENT TO A MECHANIC AND HE THOUGHT IT WASN'T THE PROBLEM OF THE ENGINE SINCE THERE WAS NO RECORD IN THE MEMORY IN THE CAR. AFTER A FEW WEEKS LATER, CAR STOPPED ON THE ROAD. TOWED THE CAR TO A MECHANIC AND DISCOVERED TWO PISTONS WERE BROKEN AND HE RECOMMENDED TO REPLACE THE ENGINE TO ANOTHER ONE WITH NEW PARTS THAT BELONG TO THE ENGINE. IT COST ME $2721.01 TOTAL TO FIX.  *NM

components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL

WHEN CHANGING LANES STEERING WHEEL VIBRATED. THE TIRES WERE WEARING UNEVENLY.  VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN TO A DEALERSHIP,  WHO INDICATED THAT THIS OCCURRED BECAUSE THE LOWER CONTROL ARMS WERE DEFECTIVE, AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE PARTS WERE REPLACED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED.*AK
AT A MERE 57,323 MILES ON MY CAR THE TIMING BELT SNAPPED IN THE MIDDLE OF MY DRIVE HOME FROM WWORK, WHICH LEFT ME STRANDED.*AK
THE CONTROL ARM MADE A CRACKING NOISE WHEN DRIVING, THERE WAS A RECALL REGARDING THE ISSUE, HOWEVER THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED.  *AK  *TS   *JB

TIMING CHAIN  WENT OUT.  TOLD WHEN THIS HAPPENS ON A DAEWOO IT USUALLY DAMAGES THE VALVES.   TOTAL COST $1400.00 WITH 1 MONTH TO GET PARTS.  SEARCH MANY GM/CHEVY PLACES WHICH NOW SERVICE THE DAEWOO.  ONLY HAVE 71240 MILES ON CAR.  GOT IT AT 51200 AND PUT AROUND 20K ON IT.    *TT

CAR QUIT IN MIDST OF DRIVING.  I THOUGHT IT STALLED.  TOWED TO SHOP TO FIND OUT THE TIMING BELT BROKE.  THIS CAR HAD 44813 MILES ON IT WHEN THIS HAPPENED, MECHANIC SAID THIS IS UNHEARD OF AND DUG TO FIND THE REASON.  WATER PUMP WAS LEAKING INTERNALLY, CAUSED THE TIMING GEAR TO RUST AND FREEZE WHICH CAUSED THE BELT TO BREAK.  THIS CAUSED ENGINE PROBLEMS AND HAD TO HAVE THE HEAD RESURFACED.  THIS PROBLEM CAUSED MAJOR PROBLEMS AND EXPENSE ($2245.17).  OWNER OF THE SHOP SAID THAT A TIMING BELT DOESN'T EVEN HAVE MAINTENANCE (LOOK AT IT) UNTIL A VEHICLE HAS 60,000 MILES ON IT.  THERE WAS NO WAY TO KNOW THAT THE WATER PUMP HAD A PROBLEM.

VEHICLE JERKS TO THE LEFT WHEN TAKING FOOT OFF THE ACCELERATOR.  FRONT END HAS MADE A SQUEAKING NOISE FOR 2 YEARS- DAEWOO MECHANIC CLAIMS THERE IS NOTHING WRONG.  HAD TO REPLACE ALL REAR BRAKES AND ROTORS AND PADS IN FRONT AFTER ONLY 36000 MILES.  DT

THE LOWER CONTROL ARM HAS PROBLEMS. DEALER HAS NOT BEEN CONTACTED.       TS  WITHOUT WARNING THE CONTROL ARM BUSHINGS WORE OUT.  THIS HAPPENED WHEN ACCELERATING OR ENGAGING IN MILD TURNS.  PARTS HAVE BEEN DIFFICULT TO OBTAIN.  *JG

WHILE DRIVING AND WITHOUT WARNING, THE CONTROL ARM BUSHINGS STARTED TO MALFUNCTION. PROBLEM HAS REOCCURRED.  DEALERSHIP WAS HAVING A DIFFICULT TIME LOCATING PARTS.*AK CONSUMER ALSO STATED THAT THE DEALERSHIP FOUND THAT IT WAS A DESIGN FLAW, AND THE VEHICLE WAS UNSAFE TO DRIVE BECAUSE IT WAS UNCONTROLLABLE.*SCC
THE DEALER REPORTS THEY HAVE 6 WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.  CAR SWERVES ON ACCELERATION.*AK
WHILE DRIVING, ENGINE CHECK LIGHT WILL COME ON.  CONSUMER HAS TO TAKE VEHICLE TO DEALER AND THEY WILL RESET THE LIGHT. THIS HAS HAPPENED TWICE.  *AK  DEALER REPLACED THE CAM SENSOR.  *JB

TIRE WAS ORIGINAL ON THE LEFT REAR MOUNT OF THE CAR, TIRE WENT FLAT, DEALER SAID THEY WOULD REPLACE THE TIRE, BUT THEY DIDN'T, DEALER PLUG THE TIRE. PUT IT ON THE LEFT FRONT AND THE TIRE BLOW OUT, THE DAY WAS SUNNY AND TRAFFIC WAS NOT HEAVY, THE TIRE HAD GOOD TREAD.
AUTOMATIC DOOR LOCKS LOCKED BY THEMSELF.
AUTOMATIC DOOR LOCKS LOCKED BY THEMSELF.

WHILE DRIVING 45 MPH CONSUMER NOTICED SMOKE COMING FROM UNDER  HOOD. PULLED OVER AND SAW  ENGINE COMPARTMENT ON FIRE. WAS ABLE TO PUT FIRE OUT. AT THIS TIME CONSUMER  WAS WAITING TO HEAR FROM DAEWOO. AMOUNT OF DAMAGE UNKNOWN.*AK
DAEWOO NUBIRA'S BRAKE GOT STUCK AND LOST CONTOL OF THE VEHICLE. EMERGENCY BRAKE WAS FROZEN AND THE CAR DOES NOT GO IN REVERSE.  *AK

I HAVE ALREADY REPORTED TO THE DEALERSHIP OF PROBLEMS WITH DECREASING SPEED, ACCELERATION AND CRUISE CONTROL OF THE DAEWOO NUBIRA.  I HAVE A STANDARD SHIFT VEHICLE WITH FIVE GEARS.  WHEN I GET THE CAR UP TO 60 MPH OR MORE AND LET UP ON THE GAS, THE CAR JERKS FORWARD AND BACK!!  I HAD THE DEALERSHIP TAKE A LOOK AT THIS PROBLEM.  THEY COMPARED MY CAR VERSUS A NEWER MODEL (WITH AN AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION) AND THEY FOUND THE SAME PROBLEMS THAT I FACED.  THEY USED THE CRUISE CONTROL AND FOUND THAT THE CAR HAS A JERKING ACTION WHILE TRYING TO MAINTAIN ITS CRUISING SPEED.  THEY INFORMED ME THAT THEY FILLED OUT A "TECH REPORT" AND THAT IN FUTURE MODELS THEY WILL WORK ON THE PROBLEM.  I REALLY DO LIKE MY CAR, BUT I CANNOT STAND THE JERKING ACTION.  I DON'T KNOW IF OTHERS HAVE REPORTED THIS PROBLEM OR IF IT IS JUST A COUPLE OF NUBIRAS THAT EXPERIENCE THESE PROBLEMS.  EITHER WAY, I CONSIDER THIS A DEFECT IN THE CRUISE CONTROL AND ACCELERATION/DECREASE OF SPEED.  THANK YOU FOR TAKING THIS REQUEST AND, IF POSSIBLE, COULD YOU INFORM ME IF THERE HAS BEEN ANY OTHER PROBLEMS SUCH AS THIS REPORTED.  THANK YOU.      - BRIAN P. BLYTHIN

WHILE DRIVING AND UPON DEPRESSING  BRAKE PEDAL ATTEMPTING TO MAKE A GRADUAL STOP, PEDAL TRAVELED TO THE FLOORBOARD, CAUSING EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE. CONSUMER HAS CONTACTED  DEALER, DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM.*AK  THE BRAKE FAILED TO ENGAGE STILL AFTER REPAIR WAS DONE.  *YH
INTERMITTENTLY BETWEEN 40 &45 MPH  VEHICLE GOES INTO A LOCK UP MODE, WHERE THE RPM'S DROP AT LEAST A 1000 RMPS, RESULTING IN LOSS OF POWER FOR A MOMENT.  DEALER HAS INSPECTED  VEHICLE.  *AK
VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN A FRONTAL COLLISION AT 25MPH, AND THE AIRBAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.   DEALER AND MANUFACTURER HAVE BEEN NOTIFIED.  *AK
